title: Matrix Multiplication
statement:
You are given two matrices mat1 of dimensions a X b and mat2 of dimensions c X d. Multiply them if they are compatible. Otherwise, print -1.

The output matrix should be the result of mat1 X mat2 modulo 1e9 + 7.
Each element of mat1 and mat2 will be a non-negative integer.
input_format:
The first line contains two integers a and b.
Then a lines follow, each with b integers: the matrix mat1.
The next line contains two integers c and d.
Then c lines follow, each with d integers: the matrix mat2.
output_format:
If matrix multiplication is not possible, print -1.
Otherwise, print the resulting matrix, with each element modulo 1e9 + 7.
See the sample testcases for better understanding.
